# Ignore unnecessary files for Unity projects
/[Ll]ibrary/
/[Tt]emp/
/[Oo]bj/
/[Bb]uild/
/[Bb]uilds/
/[Ll]ogs/
/[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/
/[Mm]emoryCaptures/
/[Rr]ecordings/

# Visual Studio/JetBrains Rider specific
.vs/
.vscode/
.vsconfig

# Autogenerated VS/MD/Consulo solution and project files
ExportedObj/
.consulo/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.TemporaryItems
.Trashes
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Builds
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage
*.unitypackage.meta
*.app


# Cache files from asset management
*.assetstoretools

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Unity Editor temp files
*.tmp

# Packed Addressables
/[Aa]ssets/[Aa]ddressable[Aa]ssets[Dd]ata/*/*.bin*
